title.rendered: Echelon Studios gripping thriller “The Gods 2” arriving on digital platforms

content.rendered:
The Gods 2 movie poster portrait

The Gods 2 movie poster landscape

The Gods 2 movie still

The action-packed sequel to “The Gods” now available to pre-order

LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA, USA, May 31, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Echelon Studio’s latest release, The Gods 2: The Dark Side is headed to video on demand (VOD), with the film now available for early Premium Digital Ownership. The movie, which premiered on February 22, will be available to own on participating digital platforms.

The Gods 2 is a follow-up to the critically acclaimed The Gods (2019) from celebrated actor and director-screenwriter, Mykel Shannon Jenkins (The Paper Tigers), which co-starred Stefania Spampinato (Grey’s Anatomy). The Gods 2 reunites Mikey James (Jenkins) with his former boss and old rival Anthony Fasano (Kevin Interdonato; Bad Frank, City on a Hill) as they team up to take revenge on a common enemy.

Commenting on the film’s extended release, Sandro Gohoho, President of Licensing and Logistics for Echelon Studios, said: “We’re so excited to bring The Gods 2 to even more streaming platforms. Both The Gods and The Gods 2 have gained a huge following among cinephiles in recent years, and we hope that by opening up the distribution, even more film fans can discover and fall in love with the franchise.”

The movie is available to pre-order to own on Apple TV, Google Play, YouTube Movies, Prime Video and Vimeo, and lands on free streaming service Mometu from 1 July.

Shreek Raivadera
Sandstar for Echelon
+ +44 7786 263221
email us here

The Gods 2: The Dark Side – Trailer

May 31, 2023, 11:42 GMT
